## Viewing JSON contents with `listviewer`

<br/>

A more intuitive way of looking at the structure of a JSON file is by using the `listviewer::jsonedit()` function.

It allows you to interactively dig deeper into the individual elements present in the JSON data.

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
listviewer::jsonedit(yelp_list, height = "800px", mode = "view")
```
